casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Antonia MILLER 2PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 2, 2018 Jason C. Yoder, Attorney at Law, for Miller, Juan Antonia. John G. Batherson, Special Deputy Attorney General, Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Ivy Johnson, Attorney at Law, Ian Mance, Attorney at Law, for Beloved Community Center of Greensboro.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of February 2018 by State of NC to Provide to this Court Copies of an Excerpt from State's Exhibit 2:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of February 2018."
